parameters.jsonBody:
={
    "resources": {
        "repositories": {
            "self": {
                "refName": "refs/heads/update-app-registration"
            }
        }
    },
    "templateParameters": {
    "AppRegistrationName": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.AppRegistrationName }}",
    "AppRegistrationClientId": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.AppRegistrationClientId }}",
    "RedirectCreate": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RedirectCreate }}",
    "RedirectType": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RedirectType }}",  
    "RedirectURI": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RedirectURI }}",  
    "EnableApiPermission": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.EnableApiPermission }}",  
    "EnableAdminConsent": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.EnableAdminConsent }}",  
    "enableGroupAssignment": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.enableGroupAssignment }}",  
    "GroupAssignment": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.GroupAssignment }}",  
    "UserAssignment": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.UserAssignment }}",
    "RemoveAssignment": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RemoveAssignment }}",
    "RemoveAssignmentType": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RemoveAssignmentType }}",
    "RemoveUserAssignment": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.RemoveUserAssignment }}",
    "Functionality": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.Functionality }}",  
    "Owner": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.Owner }}",  
    "Workload": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.Workload }}",  
    "Team": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.Team }}",  
    "ITOwner": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.ITOwner }}",  
    "TenantName": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.TenantName }}",
    "enableSecretCreation": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.enableSecretCreation }}",
    "secretName": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.secretName }}",  
    "SubscriptionID": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.SubscriptionID }}",  
    "ResourceGroupName": "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.ResourceGroupName }}",  
    "KeyVaultName":  "{{ $('When Executed by Another Workflow').item.json.KeyVaultName }}"
    }
}
